step_data.thought: I notice that the page is already in List view mode. This is evident from the URL parameter 'product_list_mode=list' and the fact that the 'List' option appears as strong text rather than a clickable link, while 'Grid' is shown as a clickable link. The page is already displaying products in List view, so the goal has been accomplished.
step_data.action: stop('The product view is already set to List view. I can see this because the List option is highlighted and not clickable, while the Grid option is shown as a clickable link. The products are currently being displayed in List format.')
